questions.question: Whatâ€™s the difference between the Merge Action and Split-Merge Block?
options: The Merge Action cannot be used from the automation writer port
The Merge Action cannot be used with Multiple Triggers
The Split-Merge block will output a single message whereas the merge does not

questions.question: Why would the Split-Merge Block be used?
options: To reduce the number of output features from a workspace, this can be useful when creating a single report of features
To merge all output features together into one, this is can be useful for creating a summary of features
To merge workspaces and other actions together, so that a workspace and other action is completed before a final action
To enhance performance in an automation through parallelism
